FuncDef: This command sets the primary destination IPv4 address of GRE encapsulated packets associated with a particular GRE tunnel. If this address is reachable in the delivery service (there is a route) then this is the destination IPv4 address of GRE encapsulated packets sent by the delivery service.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the destination IPv4 address of the GRE tunnel. Values-1.0.0.0 to 223.255.255.255.
